It does work for the pc. Just checked it. Make sure your putting the correct files into the "Data" folder. Then make sure you check off the dawnguard.esm within the "Data Files". Use nexus mod manger or just click "Data Files" when the skyrim pop-up comes up
It works on xbox. let me know if anyone can find a way to get it to work on PC
Did that but idk. might just be a problem for me. Will work on it later.

Can sombody please tell me how I install this on xbox. thanks.
Instructions on how to install this on xbox would be great.

It's legit. Unfortunately, you need a JTAG'd XBox to use it. The PC files don't work either because the textures are in a different format (.ddx vs .dds). You can add it to your Data folder and launch Skyrim, but the moment you encounter anything Dawnguard related the game will probably crash. Oh well. At least it's the real deal.
I knew somebody would upload this. Hell, I would have done it myself if I had received the beta. Good work.

It looks like it won't work on the PC, unless you want to spend a day or five decoding each individual ddx file. The game crashes if you even move the map over the location where the main fort is located. 

From what I've found  ddx files are actually two dds files combined and with a strange form of compression, just in case anyone from the Bay wants to contribute to the great crusade to piss off Micro$oft by writing a program to convert them.

It's not just the .ddx files.  The .nif files are also slightly different. There's a bit of a discussion about possible solutions going on on another site.  

I've only found one guide on hex editing a ddx into 2 dds', but the ddx files that person was using are formatted differently than these ones are, so it's of minimal help.
Oh, and the Music/Ambient sounds are xma, but those can be converted easily enough.

Could always sift through the game files on the console version, see how it decodes the files >.>

Using my 0% failing grade in Programming 1, of course.

update ur skyrim to patch 1.6
put dawnguard.esm and dawnguard.bsa into

to get the Dlc to work follow these steps
Step 1.Update Skyrim To Patch 1.6
Step 2.Copy the Dawguard.esm and Dawnguard.bsa
into your Skyrim data folder then play the game :)
